      • markUnconnected

        public void markUnconnected()
        1. start at a keepme edge 2. start traversing the network from this edge 3. when finished traversing, all the non-reachable edges will be marked with useMe=1 others with useMe =0

      • testConnectivity

        public java.util.ArrayList testConnectivity()
        tests the network. 1. find all "keepme" edges 2. start at any keepme edge, and start traversing the network should be able to get to each of the other keepme edges if you cannot, the network is disconnected (wrong) otherwise, its connected (good) O(n*m) n = # of edges, m= # keep mes
        Returns:
        list of the edges not connected - should have size() ==0 (or error) type =NetworkEdge
